product_name: Horny Toad Walkon Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: If you're looking for a walking short that has a little extra length without added weight or bulkiness, the Horny Toad Walkon Shorts have you covered with light, simple style. Soft twill fabric is made of organic cotton, recycled polyester and a touch of spandex for soft, breathable fabric that keeps up with your every move. Zip fly with button closure provides a secure fit; welted front pockets add storage space; shorts also have back flap pockets with button closure. Horny Toad Walkon Shorts feature a 9 in. inseam for complete coverage. Closeout.
short_description: If you're looking for a walking short that has a little extra length without added weight or bulkiness, the Horny Toad Walkon Shorts have you covered with light, simple style.
